<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81645</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81645</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4285</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Developing and Building a Small-scale Windmill</string>
            <string language="es">Elaboración y construcción de un pequeño molino a escala</string>
            <string language="ga">Muileann Gaoithe beag a Fhorbairt agus a Thógáil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine kleinräumige Windmühle entwickeln und 
aufbauend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Développant et construisant un moulin à vent de
petite taille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenvolvendo e construindo um moinho de vento 
small-scale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sviluppando e costruendo un mulino a vento su 
scala ridotta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάπτυξη και οικοδόμηση ενός μικρής κλίμακας 
ανεμόμυλου</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Detailed instructions and guidelines for the design and construction of a vertical axis or horizontal axis windmill.</string>
            <string language="es">Instrucciones y directrices detalladas para el diseño y la construcción de un molino con un eje vertical u horizontal.</string>
            <string language="ga">Treoracha sonracha agus treoirlínte chun ais cheartingearach nó ais chothrománach de mhuileann gaoithe a dhearadh agus a thógáil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Technology</string>
            <string language="es">Tecnología. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Teicneolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausführliche Anweisungen und Korrekturlinien 
für das Design und den Aufbau einer vertikalen Mittellinie oder 
horizontalen der Mittellinie Windmühle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Instructions détaillées et directives pour la 
conception et la construction d'un axe vertical ou d'un moulin à vent
horizontal d'axe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instruções detalhadas e guidelines para o 
projeto e a construção de uma linha central vertical ou de um moinho
de vento horizontal da linha central.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Istruzioni dettagliate e guida di riferimento per
la progettazione e la costruzione di un asse verticale o di un mulino 
a vento orizzontale di asse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λεπτομερείς εντολές και οδηγίες για το σχέδιο και την 
κατασκευή ενός κάθετου άξονα ή ενός οριζόντιου ανεμόμυλου 
άξονα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
